techmeme.title: A Samsung researcher introduces the Tiny Recursion Model, a 7M-parameter model that was able to outperform LLMs 10,000x larger like o3-mini on specific problems (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)

Anthropic's weeklong anti-AI slop pop-up in NYC's West Village, part of its "Keep Thinking" Claude push, drew 5,000+ people and 10M+ social media impressions (Trishla Ostwal/Adweek)
